p: Calu‐3 cells were transduced with lentivirus expressing shACAT1/2 for 48 h. Then, cells were treated with medium containing EtOH or 5 μM 25HC overnight. Calu‐3 cells were washed prior to infection with SARS‐CoV‐2 pseudovirus. The cells were lysed and subjected to luciferase activity measurement at 24 h post‐infection.
